column4: was wondering whats the difference between ufw and firestarter and if any which is better to use?
ufw and firestarter, essentially, perform the same task
they both work with iptables, the commandline driven interface to the firewall code integrated into the Linux Kernel

regardless, from my personal experience, I prefer firestarter, because its really easy, and the firewall configuration it uses is excellent for most client related matters (not suitable for complex networking environments etc...)
